trans-unit.source: Encapsulates HTTP-response information from an ASP.NET operation.
trans-unit.target: 封裝來自 ASP.NET 作業的 HTTP 回應資訊。

trans-unit.source: The methods and properties of the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> class are exposed through the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.Response%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> classes.
trans-unit.target: 方法和屬性<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>類別公開會透過<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.Response%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>， <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following methods of the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> class are supported only in post back scenarios and not in asynchronous post back scenarios:
trans-unit.target: 下列的方法<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>類別支援回傳的案例中，而不是在非同步 post 備份案例：

trans-unit.source: Partial-page updates are enabled when you use <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls to update selected regions of a page instead of updating the whole page with a post back.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用時，會啟用局部網頁更新<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>更新選取的區域，而不是整個頁面更新與回傳網頁的控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[UpdatePanel 控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)和[局部網頁呈現概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。

trans-unit.source: The following example draws three overlapping rectangles when the page is requested.
trans-unit.target: 要求頁面時，下列範例會繪製三個重疊的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The code begins by setting the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ContentType%2A> property to image/jpeg, so that the entire page will be rendered as a JPEG image.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼一開始會設定<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ContentType%2A>屬性為 image/jpeg、 使整個頁面將會轉譯為 JPEG 影像。

trans-unit.source: The code then calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Clear%2A> method to ensure that no extraneous content is sent with this response.
trans-unit.target: 然後程式碼會呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Clear%2A>方法，以確保沒有收集到無關的內容會與這個回應傳送。

trans-unit.source: Next, the code sets the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.BufferOutput%2A> property to true so that the page is completely processed before it is sent to the requesting client.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，此程式碼設定<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.BufferOutput%2A>屬性設定為 true，讓傳送要求的用戶端之前，將完全處理網頁。

trans-unit.source: Two objects used to draw the rectangles are then created: a <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> and a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: 然後建立兩個物件，用來繪製的矩形：<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件。

trans-unit.source: The variables created in the page are used as coordinates to draw the rectangles and a string that appears inside the largest rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 網頁中建立的變數可用以座標來繪製矩形和出現在最大的矩形內的字串。

trans-unit.source: When the three rectangles and the string that appears inside them are drawn, the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> is saved to the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.OutputStream%2A> property and its format is set to JPEG.
trans-unit.target: 繪製三個矩形和其中出現的字串、<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>儲存至<xref:System.IO.Stream>與其相關聯物件<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.OutputStream%2A>屬性，且其格式設定為 JPEG。

trans-unit.source: The code calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Dispose%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A> methods to release the resources used by the two drawing objects.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Image.Dispose%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A>方法釋放兩個物件所使用的資源。

trans-unit.source: Lastly, the code calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Flush%2A> method to send the buffered response to the requesting client.
trans-unit.target: 最後，程式碼會呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Flush%2A>方法來傳送要求的用戶端已緩衝的回應。

trans-unit.source: In code, the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> object is referred to by the keyword `Response`.
trans-unit.target: 在程式碼，<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>物件指由關鍵字`Response`。

trans-unit.source: For example, `Response.Clear()` refers to the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Clear%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`Response.Clear()`指<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Clear%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class has a property that is named <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Response%2A> that exposes the current instance of <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>類別有一個屬性，名為<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Response%2A>會公開目前的執行個體<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> object that enables custom HTTP output.
trans-unit.target: 啟用自訂 HTTP 輸出的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpResponse" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpResponse" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成員支援 .NET Framework 基礎結構，並不能直接使用於您的程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: The methods and properties of the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> class are exposed through the intrinsic <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A> object in ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 方法和屬性<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>類別會公開透過內建<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>ASP.NET 中的物件。

trans-unit.source: A file, cache key, or <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency" /> to add to the list of application dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 要加入應用程式相依性清單的檔案、快取索引鍵或 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency" />。

trans-unit.source: Associates a set of cache dependencies with the response to facilitate invalidation of the response if it is stored in the output cache and the specified dependencies change.
trans-unit.target: 如果回應儲存在輸出快取中而且指定的相依性變更，便使快取相依性集合與回應產生關聯，加速回應失效。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AddCacheDependency%2A> method allows dependencies to be created between cached responses and a <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AddCacheDependency%2A>方法可讓快取回應之間建立相依性和<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency>物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a cache dependency by using the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AddCacheDependency%2A> method and a <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何透過建立快取相依性<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AddCacheDependency%2A>方法和<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="dependencies" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dependencies" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method was called too late in the cache processing pipeline, after the cached response was already created.
trans-unit.target: 已經建立快取的回應之後，這個方法在快取處理管線中已太晚呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Makes the validity of a cached response dependent on other items in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 讓快取回應的有效性取決於快取中的其他項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> that contains the keys of the items that the current cached response is dependent upon.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />，包含目前快取回應所相依的項目索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Makes the validity of a cached response dependent on other items in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 讓快取回應的有效性取決於快取中的其他項目。

trans-unit.source: When the items referred to in the `cacheKeys` parameter are removed from the cache, the cached response of the current item is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 當項目中所參考`cacheKeys`參數會移除從快取，目前項目的快取的回應無效。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use an ASP.NET page that is output cached.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 頁面輸出快取。

trans-unit.source: The code for the page creates an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> object of keys that are associated with items that are stored in the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> object.
trans-unit.target: 網頁的程式碼會建立<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>物件中儲存的項目相關聯的索引鍵的<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>物件。

trans-unit.source: Next, the code passes the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> as the parameter in a call to the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AddCacheItemDependencies%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，在程式碼通過<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>做為參數的呼叫中<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AddCacheItemDependencies%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This makes the output cached response not valid, if any of the files specified in the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> change.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓快取輸出回應不正確，如果任何一個中指定的檔案<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>變更。

trans-unit.source: An array of item keys that the cached response is dependent upon.
trans-unit.target: 項目索引鍵的陣列，為快取回應所依存。

trans-unit.source: Makes the validity of a cached item dependent on another item in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 讓快取項目的有效性取決於快取中的另一個項目。

trans-unit.source: When any of the `cacheKey`s are removed from the cache, the cached response of the current item is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 當任一`cacheKey`s 會移除從快取，目前項目的快取的回應無效。

trans-unit.source: The key of the item that the cached response is dependent upon.
trans-unit.target: 項目的索引鍵，為快取回應所依存。

trans-unit.source: Makes the validity of a cached response dependent on another item in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 讓快取回應的有效性取決於快取中的另一個項目。

trans-unit.source: When the item corresponding to the `cacheKey` parameter is removed from the cache, the cached response of the current item is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 當對應至的項目`cacheKey`從快取移除參數，目前項目的快取的回應無效。

trans-unit.source: The following example is an ASP.NET user control that is output cached.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是輸出快取的 ASP.NET 使用者控制項。

trans-unit.source: The code for the control calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AddCacheItemDependency%2A> method with the key of an item stored in the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> object passed as its parameter.
trans-unit.target: 控制呼叫的程式碼<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AddCacheItemDependency%2A>方法中所儲存之項目的索引鍵<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>做為其參數傳遞的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the item does not exist in the cache, the control's response that was stored in the output cache is invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目不存在於快取中，就會儲存在輸出快取中的控制項的回應失效。

trans-unit.source: This means that on the subsequent request, a new version of the control's response will be added to the output cache.
trans-unit.target: 這表示在後續要求中，新版本的控制項的回應會加入至輸出快取。

trans-unit.source: Next, the code checks whether an item associated with a `bookData` key is stored in the `Cache` object, and displays one of two lines of text dependent upon the result.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，程式碼會檢查是否與項目相關聯`bookData`金鑰儲存在`Cache`物件，並會顯示兩行文字取決於結果的其中一個。

trans-unit.source: Then, the code sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, which is named `dgBooks`, with a call to a custom `DataHelper` class' shared `GetBookData` method, and populates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 然後，此程式碼設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項，名為`dgBooks`，呼叫自訂`DataHelper`類別共用`GetBookData`方法，並於其中填入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>與<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Adds a group of file names to the collection of file names on which the current response is dependent.
trans-unit.target: 將檔案名稱群組加入目前回應所依存的檔案名稱的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of files to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的檔案集合。

trans-unit.source: Adds a group of file names to the collection of file names on which the current response is dependent.
trans-unit.target: 將檔案名稱群組加入目前回應所依存的檔案名稱的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example is an ASP.NET page that is output cached.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例為 ASP.NET 頁面輸出快取。

trans-unit.source: The code for the page creates an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> of file paths, and then passes the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> as the parameter in a call to the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AddFileDependencies%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 網頁的程式碼會建立<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>的檔案路徑，然後傳遞<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>做為參數的呼叫中<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AddFileDependencies%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This makes the output cached response invalid if any of the files specified in the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> changes.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓輸出快取的回應無效任何的 if 檔案中指定<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>變更。

trans-unit.source: An array of files to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的檔案陣列。

trans-unit.source: Adds an array of file names to the collection of file names on which the current response is dependent.
trans-unit.target: 將檔案名稱陣列加入目前回應所依存的檔案名稱的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example adds an array of file names to the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AddFileDependencies%2A> file dependency list.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將檔案名稱的陣列<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AddFileDependencies%2A>檔案相依性清單。

trans-unit.source: If the files changes, the cached response is invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案變更，則會快取的回應失效。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single file name to the collection of file names on which the current response is dependent.
trans-unit.target: 將單一檔案名稱加入目前回應所依存的檔案名稱的集合。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AddFileDependency%2A> method to add a file dependency, you must also specify output caching programmatically or declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AddFileDependency%2A>方法，將檔案相依性，您也必須指定輸出快取，以程式設計方式或以宣告方式。

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify output caching declaratively, use the directive.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要指定輸出快取以宣告方式，使用指示詞。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Cache Page Output with File Dependencies](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/95ad1c54-329e-45af-9343-a03a1d2ce9db).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 檔案相依性與快取頁面輸出](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/95ad1c54-329e-45af-9343-a03a1d2ce9db)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add a single file name to the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AddFileDependency%2A> file dependency list.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何將加入至單一檔案名稱<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AddFileDependency%2A>檔案相依性清單。

trans-unit.source: If the file changes, the cached response is invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 如果變更的檔案，則會快取的回應失效。

trans-unit.source: The name of the HTTP header to add <c>value</c> to.
trans-unit.target: 要新增 <c>value</c> 之 HTTP 標頭的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The string to add to the header.
trans-unit.target: 要加入標頭的字串。

trans-unit.source: Adds an HTTP header to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 將 HTTP 標頭加入輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Web.HttpResponse.AddHeader(System.String,System.String)" /> is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.HttpResponse.AddHeader(System.String,System.String)" /> 是提供來與 ASP 先前版本相容。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AddHeader%2A> is the same as <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AppendHeader%2A> and is provided only for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AddHeader%2A> 等同於<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AppendHeader%2A>並提供是為了與 ASP 的舊版本相容性。

trans-unit.source: With ASP.NET, use <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AppendHeader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ASP.NET， <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AppendHeader%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The callback method.
trans-unit.target: 回呼方法。

trans-unit.source: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.2 and later versions]
trans-unit.target: [在 .NET Framework 4.5.2 及更新版本中支援]

trans-unit.source: Registers a callback that the ASP.NET runtime will invoke immediately before response headers are sent for this request.
trans-unit.target: 註冊 ASP.NET 執行階段會立即在回應標頭傳送給這個要求之前叫用的回呼。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.ISubscriptionToken" /> object that represents the subscription to the OnSendingHeaders pseudo-event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.ISubscriptionToken" /> 物件，代表 OnSendingHeaders 虛擬事件的訂閱。

trans-unit.source: The AddOnSendingHeaders method is not invoked if the native module flushes the response first.
trans-unit.target: AddOnSendingHeaders 方法不會叫用，如果原生模組第一次排清回應。

trans-unit.source: The pseudo-event OnSendingHeaders differs from the IHttpModule-level pipeline event in that it is a per-request subscription rather than a per-application subscription.
trans-unit.target: 虛擬事件 OnSendingHeaders 不同 IHttpModule 層級管線事件，因為它要求每個訂用帳戶，而不是每個應用程式的訂用帳戶。

trans-unit.source: The intent is that the callback may modify the response status code or may set a response cookie or header.
trans-unit.target: 其目的是回呼可能會修改回應狀態碼，或可能會設定回應的 cookie 或標頭。

trans-unit.source: Other usage notes and caveats:
trans-unit.target: 其他的使用方式的事項及警告：

trans-unit.source: This method is effective only when IIS runs in integrated pipeline mode pipeline and only if response headers haven't yet been sent for the current request.
trans-unit.target: IIS integrated 的管線模式管線中執行時，才，而且只有在回應標頭尚未針對目前的要求已傳送，這個方法會有效。

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET runtime does not guarantee anything about the thread that the callback is invoked on.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 執行階段不保證任何關於的執行緒叫用回呼。

trans-unit.source: For example, the callback may be invoked synchronously in a background thread if a background flush is being performed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可能會叫用回呼以同步方式在背景執行緒中如果正在執行背景清除。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A> is not guaranteed to be available in such a thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A> 不保證可在這類執行緒中使用。

trans-unit.source: The callback must not call any method that manipulates the response entity body or that results in a flush.
trans-unit.target: 回呼必須呼叫操縱回應實體本文或排清，產生的任何方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the callback must not call <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A>, as that method may manipulate the response entity body.
trans-unit.target: 例如，不可呼叫回呼<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A>，因為該方法可能會操作回應實體本文。

trans-unit.source: The callback must contain only short-running synchronous code.
trans-unit.target: 回呼必須只包含執行短期同步程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to invoke an asynchronous operation or wait on such an operation could result in a deadlock.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試叫用非同步作業，或等候這類作業可能會導致死結。

trans-unit.source: The callback must not throw an exception; otherwise behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 回呼必須不會擲回例外狀況。否則行為是未定義。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpCookie" /> to add to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 要加入輸出資料流的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpCookie" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds an HTTP cookie to the intrinsic cookie collection.
trans-unit.target: 將 HTTP Cookie 加入內建 Cookie 集合中。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new cookie named `LastVisit`, sets the value of the cookie to the current date and time, and appends the cookie to the current cookie collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立名為新的 cookie`LastVisit`管理員、 設定 cookie 的值為目前的日期和時間，並將 cookie 附加至目前的 cookie 集合。

trans-unit.source: All cookies in the cookie collection are sent to the client in the `Set-Cookie` header with the HTTP output stream.
trans-unit.target: 中的用戶端會傳送的 cookie 集合中的所有 cookie `Set-Cookie` http 標頭輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: A cookie is appended after the HTTP headers have been sent.
trans-unit.target: 在 HTTP 標頭送出之後，附加 Cookie。

trans-unit.source: The name of the HTTP header to add to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 要加入輸出資料流的 HTTP 標頭名稱。

trans-unit.source: The string to append to the header.
trans-unit.target: 附加到標頭的字串。

trans-unit.source: Adds an HTTP header to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 將 HTTP 標頭加入輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AppendHeader%2A> method to send cache-specific headers and at the same time use the cache object model (<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cache%2A>) to set cache policy, HTTP response headers that pertain to caching (`Cache-Control`, `Expires`, `Last-Modified`, `Pragma`, and `Vary`) might be deleted when the cache object model is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AppendHeader%2A>方法來傳送快取特定標頭，並同時使用快取物件模型 (<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cache%2A>) 以設定快取原則，與快取 HTTP 回應標頭 (`Cache-Control`， `Expires`， `Last-Modified`， `Pragma`，和`Vary`) 快取物件模型使用時可能會被刪除。

trans-unit.source: This behavior enables ASP.NET to maintain the most restrictive settings.
trans-unit.target: 此行為可讓 ASP.NET 成為維護限制最嚴格的設定。

trans-unit.source: For example, consider a page that includes user controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，考慮一個網頁，內含使用者控制項。

trans-unit.source: If those controls have conflicting cache policies, the most restrictive cache policy will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些控制項有快取原則衝突，則將使用限制最嚴格的快取原則。

trans-unit.source: If one user control sets the header "`Cache-Control: Public`" and another user control sets the more restrictive header "`Cache-Control: Private`" via calls to <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability%2A>, then the "`Cache-Control: Private`" header will be sent with the response.
trans-unit.target: 如果一個使用者控制項設定標頭 」`Cache-Control: Public`"和另一個使用者控制項設定更具限制性的標頭 」`Cache-Control: Private`」 透過呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.SetCacheability%2A>，則 「`Cache-Control: Private`"標頭會隨著回應一起傳送。

trans-unit.source: For a list of standard HTTP/1.1 headers, see section 14, "Header Field Definitions," in the [Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=73147) specification on the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 標準 HTTP/1.1 標頭的清單，請參閱 14 中，「 標頭欄位定義 」 一節，在[超文字傳輸通訊協定-HTTP/1.1](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=73147) World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站上的規格。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AppendHeader%2A> method to add a custom header to the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> object sent to the requesting client.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.AppendHeader%2A>方法，將自訂標頭<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>傳送要求的用戶端物件。

trans-unit.source: The header is appended after the HTTP headers have been sent.
trans-unit.target: 標頭在 HTTP 標頭送出之後被附加。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the log file.
trans-unit.target: 要加入記錄檔的文字。

trans-unit.source: Adds custom log information to the Internet Information Services (IIS) log file.
trans-unit.target: 將自訂記錄資訊加入網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: To allow for the specified string to be recorded in the log file, you first must enable the **URI Query** option of the **Extended Logging Properties** dialog box for the site that you want to log activity for in IIS.
trans-unit.target: 若要允許記錄在記錄檔中指定的字串，必須先啟用**URI 查詢**選項**擴充記錄內容**的網站，您想要在 IIS 中記錄的活動 對話方塊.

trans-unit.source: To customize extended logging in IIS 6.0, follow these steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要自訂擴充在 IIS 6.0 中的記錄，請遵循下列步驟：

trans-unit.source: In IIS Manager, expand the local computer node, expand the Web or FTP Sites folder, right-click the Web or FTP site, and then click **Properties**.
trans-unit.target: 在 IIS 管理員 中，展開 本機電腦 節點，展開 Web 或 FTP 站台資料夾、 Web 或 FTP 站台，以滑鼠右鍵按一下，然後按一下**屬性**。

trans-unit.source: Click the **Web or FTP Site** tab, and then select the **Enable logging** check box (if it is not already selected).
trans-unit.target: 按一下**Web 或 FTP 站台**索引標籤，然後選取**啟用記錄**核取方塊 （如果尚未選取）。

trans-unit.source: In the **Active log format** box, click **W3C Extended Log File Format**.
trans-unit.target: 在**作用中的記錄檔格式**方塊中，按一下**W3C 擴充記錄檔格式**。

trans-unit.source: Click **Properties**.
trans-unit.target: 按一下**屬性**。

trans-unit.source: Click the **Advanced** tab, select the properties that you want to log, and then click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: 按一下**進階**索引標籤上，選取您想要記錄，然後按一下屬性**確定**。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to append a string to the log.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示如何將字串附加至記錄檔。

trans-unit.target: 如果基礎<xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest>物件支援非同步清除作業，從非同步模組事件或非同步處理常式會呼叫這個方法會以非同步方式執行清除作業。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to buffer output and send it after the complete response is finished processing.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要緩衝輸出並在整個回應處理完成之後將它送出。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the output to client is buffered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果對用戶端的輸出有緩衝，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Buffer%2A> property has been deprecated in favor of the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.BufferOutput%2A> property and is provided only for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Buffer%2A>屬性已被取代之喜好<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.BufferOutput%2A>屬性並提供是為了與 ASP 的舊版本相容性。

trans-unit.source: With ASP.NET, use <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.BufferOutput%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ASP.NET， <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.BufferOutput%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to buffer output and send it after the complete page is finished processing.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要緩衝輸出並在整個網頁處理完成之後送出。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the output to client is buffered; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果對用戶端的輸出有緩衝，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ContentType%2A> property for the response to image/jpeg, calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Clear%2A> method to remove other content that might be attached to the response, and then sets the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.BufferOutput%2A> property to true so that the entire page will be processed before any content is sent to the requesting client.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會設定<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ContentType%2A>屬性為 image/jpeg、 回應呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Clear%2A>方法可能會附加至回應，並設定其他內容中移除<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.BufferOutput%2A>屬性設定為 true，因此會使用整個頁面處理要求的用戶端傳送的任何內容之前。

trans-unit.source: For a complete example, see the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> class.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="Cache-Control" /> HTTP header that matches one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpCacheability" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定符合其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpCacheability" /> 列舉值的 <see langword="Cache-Control" /> HTTP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpCacheability" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 字串，代表 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpCacheability" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The values for `Private`, `Public`, and `No-Cache` are strings and must be enclosed in quotation marks (" ").
trans-unit.target: 值`Private`， `Public`，和`No-Cache`是，且必須括在引號 ("")。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.CacheControl%2A> property is set to a value that does not match one of the <xref:System.Web.HttpCacheability> enumeration values, then an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.CacheControl%2A>屬性設定為不符合其中一個值<xref:System.Web.HttpCacheability>列舉值，則<xref:System.ArgumentException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.CacheControl%2A> property is not set, the cacheability of the response is set to <xref:System.Web.HttpCacheability.NoCache>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.CacheControl%2A>屬性未設定，快取的回應性會設定為<xref:System.Web.HttpCacheability.NoCache>。

trans-unit.source: The `CacheControl`, <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Expires%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ExpiresAbsolute%2A> properties have been deprecated.
trans-unit.target: `CacheControl`， <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Expires%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ExpiresAbsolute%2A>屬性已被取代。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the methods of the <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy> class are available through the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cache%2A> intrinsic object to control the Internet Information Services (IIS) output cache and client caches.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，方法<xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy>類別都是透過<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cache%2A>來控制 網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 的內建物件輸出快取和用戶端快取。

trans-unit.source: The string value set does not match one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpCacheability" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 設定的字串值不符合其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpCacheability" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會設定<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ContentType%2A>屬性為 image/jpeg、 回應呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Clear%2A>方法可能會附加至回應，並設定其他內容中移除<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.BufferOutput%2A>屬性設定為 true，因此會在整個頁面處理要求的用戶端傳送的任何內容之前。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> object that is tripped when the client disconnects.
trans-unit.target: 取得用戶端中斷連接時發生錯誤的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation token.
trans-unit.target: 取消語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: This API is thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已具備執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: However, there are some restrictions on how the cancellation token should be used.
trans-unit.target: 不過，有一些限制，應該如何使用取消語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Using it incorrectly can lead to race conditions, deadlocks, or other unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: 不當使用它可能會導致競爭條件、 死結或其他意外的行為。

trans-unit.source: Keep in mind the following guidelines:
trans-unit.target: 請注意下列指導方針：

trans-unit.source: Ensure that you don't call into this API outside the bounds of a single request, because ASP.NET will dispose of the cancellation token at the end of the request.
trans-unit.target: 因為 ASP.NET 將處置的取消語彙基元要求結尾，請確定在未呼叫此 api 在單一要求的範圍之外。

trans-unit.source: There is no guarantee that the token will ever transition to a canceled state before it is disposed.
trans-unit.target: 沒有保證權杖就會永遠轉換成已取消的狀態之前加以處置。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the request finishes without the client having disconnected, the token will be disposed without having first been canceled.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果不需要中斷連線的用戶端完成要求時，會處置語彙基元而不需先取消。

trans-unit.source: Do not wait on the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.WaitHandle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, as this defeats the purpose of an asynchronous notification and can cause deadlocks.
trans-unit.target: 不需要等候<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.WaitHandle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，如這個非同步通知的目的，就失去了，而且可能會導致死結。

trans-unit.source: Do not call the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.Register%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> overloads which invoke the callback on the original <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext> object.
trans-unit.target: 請勿呼叫<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.Register%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>多載，就會叫用回呼原始<xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>物件。

trans-unit.source: Do not use the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> object or other non-thread-safe ASP.NET intrinsic objects from within the callback provided to the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.Register%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>物件或其他非安全執行緒 ASP.NET 內建物件提供給回呼內部<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.Register%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The callback may be running concurrently with other ASP.NET or application code.
trans-unit.target: 回呼可能會執行與其他 ASP.NET 或應用程式程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Keep the callback methods short-running and non-blocking.
trans-unit.target: 保留執行短期的回呼方法和非封鎖。

trans-unit.source: Make every effort to avoid throwing exceptions from within the callback methods.
trans-unit.target: 請致力將避免擲回例外狀況從回呼方法中。

trans-unit.source: This property is only applicable to Internet Information Service (IIS) 7.5 in integrated mode.
trans-unit.target: 在整合模式下，才適用網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 7.5 至這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you invoke it without the right IIS version or pipeline mode, a <xref:System.PlatformNotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有正確的 IIS 版本或管線模式，叫用<xref:System.PlatformNotSupportedException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: To determine the IIS version, use <xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.IISVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷 IIS 版本，請使用<xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.IISVersion%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To determine the pipeline mode, use <xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.UsingIntegratedPipeline%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷管線模式，請使用<xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.UsingIntegratedPipeline%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Closes the socket connection to a client.
trans-unit.target: 關閉與用戶端的通訊端連接。

trans-unit.source: This method terminates the connection to the client in an abrupt manner and is not intended for normal HTTP request processing.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法以突然方式終止用戶端的連接，並不適用於一般的 HTTP 要求處理。

trans-unit.source: The method sends a reset packet to the client, which can cause response data that is buffered on the server, the client, or somewhere in between to be dropped.
trans-unit.target: 方法會重設封包傳送到用戶端，可能會造成的緩衝處理回應資料伺服器、 用戶端，或某處之間要卸除。

trans-unit.source: However, typically you should call <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A> instead if you want to jump ahead to the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> event and send a response to the client.
trans-unit.target: 不過，通常您應該呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A>而如果您想要往前跳至<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest>事件，並將傳送至用戶端的回應。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the HTTP character set of the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定輸出資料流的 HTTP 字元集。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> object that contains information about the character set of the current response.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> 物件，包含目前回應之字元集的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Default `ContentEncoding` can be specified in an ASP.NET configuration file in the [globalization Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2dffc8e-ebd2-439b-a2fd-e3ac5e620da7) section.
trans-unit.target: 預設`ContentEncoding`可以在 ASP.NET 組態檔中指定[全球化項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2dffc8e-ebd2-439b-a2fd-e3ac5e620da7) > 一節。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ContentEncoding%2A> is specified by the client, the default configuration settings are overridden.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ContentEncoding%2A>指定用戶端的預設組態設定會覆寫。

trans-unit.source: The following example writes a human-readable description of the character set encoding to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會寫字元集編碼方式寫入輸出資料流的人們可讀取描述。

trans-unit.source: Attempted to set <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpResponse.ContentEncoding" /> to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpResponse.ContentEncoding" /> 設定為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the HTTP MIME type of the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定輸出資料流的 HTTP MIME 類型。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP MIME type of the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 輸出資料流的 HTTP MIME 類型。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "<see langword="text/html" />".
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 "<see langword="text/html" />"。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ContentType%2A> property for the response to image/jpeg, calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Clear%2A> method to remove other content that might be attached to the response, and then sets the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.BufferOutput%2A> property to true so that the complete page will be processed before any content is sent to the requesting client.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會設定<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ContentType%2A>屬性為 image/jpeg、 回應呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Clear%2A>方法可能會附加至回應，並設定其他內容中移除<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.BufferOutput%2A>屬性設定為 true，因此會在整個頁面處理要求的用戶端傳送的任何內容之前。

trans-unit.source: For a complete example, see the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需完整範例，請參閱<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpResponse.ContentType" /> property is set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpResponse.ContentType" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the response cookie collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得回應 Cookie 集合。

trans-unit.source: The response cookie collection.
trans-unit.target: 回應 Cookie 集合。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET includes two intrinsic cookie collections.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 包含兩個內建 cookie 集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection accessed through the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A> collection of <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> contains cookies transmitted by the client to the server in the `Cookie` header.
trans-unit.target: 透過集合<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>包含用戶端中的伺服器傳送的 cookie`Cookie`標頭。

trans-unit.source: The collection accessed through the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cookies%2A> collection of <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> contains new cookies created on the server and transmitted to the client in the `Set-Cookie` header.
trans-unit.target: 透過集合<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cookies%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>包含在伺服器上建立並傳送給用戶端的新 cookie`Set-Cookie`標頭。

trans-unit.source: After you add a cookie by using the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cookies%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection, the cookie is immediately available in the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection, even if the response has not been sent to the client.
trans-unit.target: 使用新增 cookie 之後<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cookies%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合，cookie 可立即用於<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合，即使尚未傳送回應至用戶端。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new cookie named `LastVisit`, sets the value of the cookie to the current date and time, and adds the cookie to the current cookie collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立名為新的 cookie`LastVisit`管理員、 設定 cookie 的值為目前的日期和時間，並將 cookie 加入至目前的 cookie 集合。

trans-unit.source: All cookies in the cookie collection are sent to the client in the `Set-Cookie` header with the HTTP output stream.
trans-unit.target: 中的用戶端會傳送的 cookie 集合中的所有 cookie `Set-Cookie` http 標頭輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Disables kernel caching for the current response.
trans-unit.target: 停用目前回應的核心快取處理。

trans-unit.source: If kernel caching is not supported, this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果不支援的核心快取，則這個方法沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Disables IIS user-mode caching for this response.
trans-unit.target: 停用這個回應的 IIS 使用者模式快取。

trans-unit.source: If IIS user-mode caching is not supported, this method returns without performing any action.
trans-unit.target: 如果不支援的 IIS 使用者模式快取，這個方法會傳回而不執行任何動作。

trans-unit.source: Sends all currently buffered output to the client, stops execution of the page, and raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 將目前所有受緩衝的輸出傳送到用戶端、停止網頁的執行，並引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided only for compatibility with ASP—that is, for compatibility with COM-based Web-programming technology that preceded ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只為了與 ASP 的相容性 — 也就是以 COM 為基礎的 Web 程式設計技術，前面有 ASP.NET 相容性。

trans-unit.source: If you want to jump ahead to the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> event and send a response to the client, it is usually preferable to call <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要往前跳至<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest>事件，並將傳送至用戶端的回應，它通常最好是呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A>改為。

trans-unit.source: To mimic the behavior of the `End` method in ASP, this method tries to raise a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 若要模擬的行為`End`ASP 中的方法，這個方法會嘗試以引發<xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If this attempt is successful, the calling thread will be aborted, which is detrimental to your site's performance.
trans-unit.target: 如果此嘗試成功，將會中止呼叫執行緒，即危害到您的網站效能。

trans-unit.source: In that case, no code after the call to the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A> method is executed.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，在呼叫之後任何程式碼<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A>執行方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A> method is not able to raise a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>, it instead flushes the response bytes to the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A>方法不是無法提高<xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>，而是會清除回應位元組至用戶端。

trans-unit.source: It does this synchronously, which can also be detrimental to your site's performance.
trans-unit.target: 這會同步執行，這也可能危害到您的網站效能。

trans-unit.source: In either case (whether or not a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException> exception is successfully raised), the response pipeline jumps ahead to the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情況下 (不論是否<xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>成功引發例外狀況)，回應管線向前跳至<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A> method does not raise an exception, and code after the call to the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A> method might be executed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A>方法不會引發例外狀況，程式碼的呼叫後方<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A>方法可能會執行。

trans-unit.source: If your intention is to avoid execution of subsequent code, and if the performance penalty of <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A> is acceptable, you can call <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A> instead of <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是要避免執行後續的程式碼，而且會降低效能<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A>可接受的您可以呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A>而不是<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The call to <see cref="M:System.Web.HttpResponse.End" /> has terminated the current request.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.HttpResponse.End" /> 呼叫已終止目前要求。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous result object.
trans-unit.target: 非同步結果物件。

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous flush operation.
trans-unit.target: 完成非同步的清除作業。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous flush is not supported and the <paramref name="asyncResult" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 不支援非同步排清，而且 <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous flush is not supported and the <paramref name="asyncResult" /> parameter cannot be cast to a <c>FlushAsyncResult</c> object.
trans-unit.target: 不支援非同步排清，而且 <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 參數無法轉換成 <c>FlushAsyncResult</c> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of minutes before a page cached on a browser expires.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定瀏覽器上快取網頁到期以前的分鐘數。

trans-unit.source: If the user returns to the same page before it expires, the cached version is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者在頁面到期前返回相同的頁面，則會顯示快取版本。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpResponse.Expires" /> is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpResponse.Expires" /> 是提供來與 ASP 先前版本相容。

trans-unit.source: The number of minutes before the page expires.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面到期前的分鐘數。

trans-unit.source: The `Expires`, <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ExpiresAbsolute%2A> and <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.CacheControl%2A> properties have been deprecated in favor of the methods of the <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy> class available through the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cache%2A> intrinsic object to control the Internet Information Services (IIS) output cache and client caches.
trans-unit.target: `Expires`，<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.ExpiresAbsolute%2A>和<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.CacheControl%2A>屬性已被取代的方法為<xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy>類別可透過<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cache%2A>輸出快取來控制 網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 的內建函式物件。和用戶端快取。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the absolute date and time at which to remove cached information from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定從快取中移除快取資訊的絕對日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpResponse.ExpiresAbsolute" /> is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpResponse.ExpiresAbsolute" /> 是提供來與 ASP 先前版本相容。

trans-unit.source: The date and time at which the page expires.
trans-unit.target: 頁面到期的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The `ExpiresAbsolute`, <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Expires%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.CacheControl%2A> properties have been deprecated in favor of the methods of the <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy> class available through the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cache%2A> intrinsic object to control the Internet Information Services (IIS) output cache and client caches.
trans-unit.target: `ExpiresAbsolute`， <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Expires%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.CacheControl%2A>屬性已被取代的方法為<xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy>類別可透過<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Cache%2A>輸出快取來控制 網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 的內建函式物件。和用戶端快取。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a wrapping filter object that is used to modify the HTTP entity body before transmission.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來在傳輸之前修改 HTTP 實體主體的包裝篩選物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object that acts as the output filter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件，做為輸出篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: When you create a `Stream` object and set the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Filter%2A> property to the `Stream` object, all HTTP output sent by <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Write%2A> passes through the filter.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立`Stream`物件，並設定<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Filter%2A>屬性`Stream`物件，所有的 HTTP 傳送輸出<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Write%2A>通過篩選。

trans-unit.source: The following example is an ASP.NET page that sets the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Filter%2A> property to a new instance of the `UpperCaseFilter` class, a custom <xref:System.IO.Stream> class that converts all text that passes through it to uppercase.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會設定 ASP.NET 網頁<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Filter%2A>屬性的新執行個體`UpperCaseFilter`類別，自訂<xref:System.IO.Stream>將轉換成大寫通過的所有文字的類別。

trans-unit.source: The information about the request is saved to a text file, and then the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Filter%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 要求的相關資訊會儲存到文字檔，然後<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Filter%2A>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: After the response filter is in place, the code calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.MapPath%2A> method to get the absolute path to a text file named `TestFile.txt` that serves as the source for the content of the response.
trans-unit.target: 回應篩選備妥之後，程式碼會呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.MapPath%2A>方法來取得名為文字檔案的絕對路徑`TestFile.txt`做為回應的內容的來源。

trans-unit.source: The code then creates a new <xref:System.IO.StreamReader> object to read the text file from beginning to end, and then calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Write%2A> method to display the content of the file on the page.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼接著會建立新<xref:System.IO.StreamReader>物件來讀取文字檔案從開始到結束，然後呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Write%2A>方法，以顯示在頁面上檔案的內容。

trans-unit.source: Filtering is not allowed with the entity.
trans-unit.target: 不允許以實體篩選。

trans-unit.source: Sends all currently buffered output to the client.
trans-unit.target: 送出所有目前正在緩衝的輸出到用戶端。

trans-unit.source: Forces all currently buffered output to be sent to the client.
trans-unit.target: 強制所有目前正在緩衝的輸出傳送至用戶端。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Flush%2A> method can be called multiple times during request processing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Flush%2A>方法可以要求處理期間呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A> method to save a <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> object to the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.OutputStream%2A> property and converts the image to the JPEG format.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Save%2A>方法來儲存<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>物件<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.OutputStream%2A>屬性並將轉換為 JPEG 影像格式。

trans-unit.source: The code then calls the `Dispose` method on the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> object and a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, releasing the resources that they were using.
trans-unit.target: 然後程式碼會呼叫`Dispose`方法<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>物件和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件，正在使用的資源釋出。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Flush%2A> method to send the content of the response to the requesting client.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Flush%2A>方法來傳送要求的用戶端之回應的內容。

trans-unit.source: For a complete example, see the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需完整範例，請參閱<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>類別。

trans-unit.source: The cache is flushed after the response has been sent.
trans-unit.target: 快取在回應送出之後被清除。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously sends all currently buffered output to the client.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式將目前所緩衝的所輸出輸送到用戶端。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> that represents the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步作業的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> object that represents the encoding for the current header output stream.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> 物件，代表目前標頭輸出資料流的編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> that contains information about the character set for the current header.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" />，包含目前標頭之字元集的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.HeaderEncoding%2A> property gives you the ability to disable or change the <xref:System.Text.Encoding> object on a response header by using the <xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>, <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>, <xref:System.Text.UTF7Encoding>, or <xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.HeaderEncoding%2A>屬性可讓您停用或變更<xref:System.Text.Encoding>物件上使用的回應標頭<xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>， <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>， <xref:System.Text.UTF7Encoding>，或<xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>物件。

trans-unit.source: The default encoding value is the <xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding> class.
trans-unit.target: 預設編碼方式值是<xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>類別。

trans-unit.source: By changing the type of the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.HeaderEncoding%2A> property, you can potentially increase the risk of certain malicious attacks or cause sensitive data to be sent through the response header.
trans-unit.target: 型別變更<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.HeaderEncoding%2A>屬性，您可以提高特定惡意攻擊或透過回應標頭傳送的原因機密資料的風險。

trans-unit.source: Header injection attacks can be avoided, in part, by leaving the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.HeaderEncoding%2A> property of a response to the default setting.
trans-unit.target: 標頭插入式攻擊，部份，即可避免離開<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.HeaderEncoding%2A>屬性的預設設定的回應。

trans-unit.source: An attack against a vulnerable application could echo back entrusted data as part of a response header.
trans-unit.target: 針對應用程式容易遭受攻擊，無法回應未受信任的資料做為回應標頭的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.HeaderEncoding%2A> is disabled because of a requirement for continuation lines in a header or if any header is constructed based on the result of untrusted data, the header data should be validated before sending to the response stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.HeaderEncoding%2A>接續標頭中的線條，或如果任何標頭會建構為基礎的不受信任的資料的結果，應驗證標頭資料傳送至回應資料流之前，先停用由於需求。

trans-unit.source: The encoding value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 編碼的值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The encoding value is <see cref="P:System.Text.Encoding.Unicode" />.
trans-unit.target: 編碼的值是 <see cref="P:System.Text.Encoding.Unicode" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The headers have already been sent.
trans-unit.target: 已傳送標頭。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of response headers.
trans-unit.target: 取得回應標頭的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> of response headers.
trans-unit.target: 回應標頭的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Headers%2A> property is only supported with the [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] integrated pipeline mode and at least the .NET Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Headers%2A>屬性僅支援[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]整合式的管線模式且至少.NET Framework 3.0。

trans-unit.source: When you try to access the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Headers%2A> property and either of these two conditions is not met, a <xref:System.PlatformNotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 當您嘗試存取<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Headers%2A>屬性，其中這兩項條件不符合，<xref:System.PlatformNotSupportedException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: The operation requires the integrated pipeline mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework version 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此作業需要在 [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] 的整合管線模式中，且至少為 .NET Framework 3.0 版。

trans-unit.source: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.2 and later versions]
trans-unit.target: [在 .NET Framework 4.5.2 及更新版本中支援]

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the response headers have been written.
trans-unit.target: 取得指出是否已寫入回應標頭的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the response headers have been written; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已寫入回應標頭則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the client is still connected to the server.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出用戶端是否仍然與伺服器連接著。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the client is currently connected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前已連接到用戶端，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.IsClientConnected%2A> property returns `false` when the following conditions are true:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.IsClientConnected%2A>屬性會傳回`false`下列條件成立：

trans-unit.source: The connection to the client was terminated.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端的連線已終止。

trans-unit.source: This can occur if the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Close%2A> method was invoked, or if the client stopped execution of the Web page or browsed to another page.
trans-unit.target: 這種情形<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Close%2A>叫用方法，或用戶端停止執行的網頁，或瀏覽至另一個頁面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest> object that is handling the request is `null` or the <xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest.IsClientConnected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest>處理要求的物件是`null`或<xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest.IsClientConnected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If a custom <xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest> object handles the request, then the <xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest.IsClientConnected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method might be set based on custom criteria.
trans-unit.target: 如果自訂<xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest>物件會處理要求，然後在<xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest.IsClientConnected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法可能會根據設定自訂準則。

trans-unit.source: For example, the custom worker request might force a time-out after a period of time.
trans-unit.target: 例如，自訂背景工作要求可能會在一段時間之後強制逾時。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.IsClientConnected%2A> property to check whether the client that is requesting the page remains connected to the server.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.IsClientConnected%2A>屬性來檢查是否要求網頁用戶端仍然連接到伺服器。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.IsClientConnected%2A> is true, the code calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A> method, and the client will view another page.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.IsClientConnected%2A>為 true，程式碼會呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A>方法和用戶端會檢視另一頁。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.IsClientConnected%2A> is false, then the code calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A> method and all page processing is terminated.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.IsClientConnected%2A>為 false，則程式碼會呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A>方法和所有的網頁處理已終止。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the client is being transferred to a new location.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值，指出用戶端是否傳輸至新位置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value of the location response header is different than the current location; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果位置回應標頭的值不同於目前的位置，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.IsRequestBeingRedirected%2A> property with the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.RedirectLocation%2A> property to test and determine whether the absolute URI that is transmitted to the client in the HTTP `Location` header is different than the current URI and what the new intended URI that is being transferred to will be.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.IsRequestBeingRedirected%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.RedirectLocation%2A>屬性測試，並決定是否絕對 URI 傳輸至用戶端在 HTTP`Location`標頭是不同於目前的 URI 以及什麼是新的預定的 URI將會傳送到。

trans-unit.source: Enables output of text to the outgoing HTTP response stream.
trans-unit.target: 允許文字輸出至傳出 HTTP 回應資料流。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> object that enables custom output to the client.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> 物件，允許自訂輸出至用戶端。

trans-unit.source: The following example is an ASP.NET page that contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control that has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextMode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxMode.MultiLine>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是 ASP.NET 網頁，其中包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控制項具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxMode.MultiLine>。

trans-unit.source: The page's code takes the text that a user enters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextMode%2A>, uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlEncode%2A> method to HTML encode it, and the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Output%2A> property to display the encoded string to the page.
trans-unit.target: 網頁的程式碼會採用使用者在輸入的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextMode%2A>，會使用<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlEncode%2A>方法，以 HTML 編碼，而<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Output%2A>屬性，以顯示頁面的編碼的字串。

trans-unit.source: Enables binary output to the outgoing HTTP content body.
trans-unit.target: 允許二進位輸出至傳出 HTTP 內容主體。

trans-unit.source: An IO <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> representing the raw contents of the outgoing HTTP content body.
trans-unit.target: IO <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />，代表連出 HTTP 內容主體的原始內容。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, when you use the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%28System.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the IO stream returned by the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.OutputStream%2A> property, the following exceptions might be thrown:
trans-unit.target: 當您使用.NET Framework 2.0 版中，從開始<xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%28System.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法所傳回的 IO 資料流<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.OutputStream%2A>屬性，下列的例外狀況可能會擲回：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>, if the `offset` or `count` parameter is negative or if the `buffer` parameter's length minus the `offset` parameter is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>如果`offset`或`count`參數是負值或`buffer`參數的長度減去`offset`參數小於或等於零。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>, if the `buffer` parameter is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>如果`buffer`參數是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A> method to save a <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> object to the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.OutputStream%2A> property, and converts the image to the JPEG format.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A>方法來儲存<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>物件<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.OutputStream%2A>屬性，並將影像轉換成 JPEG 格式。

trans-unit.source: The code then calls the Dispose method on the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> object and a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, releasing the resources that they were using.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼接著會呼叫 Dispose 方法上<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>物件和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件，正在使用的資源釋出。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the code calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Flush%2A> method to send the content of the response to the requesting client.
trans-unit.target: 最後，程式碼會呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Flush%2A>方法來傳送要求的用戶端之回應的內容。

trans-unit.source: For a complete example, see the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需完整範例，請參閱<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="OutputStream" /> is not available.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="OutputStream" /> 無法使用。

trans-unit.source: The string to add to the <see langword="PICS-Label" /> header.
trans-unit.target: 要加入 <see langword="PICS-Label" /> 標頭的字串。

trans-unit.source: Appends a HTTP <see langword="PICS-Label" /> header to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 附加 HTTP <see langword="PICS-Label" /> 標頭至輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Platform for Internet Content Selection (PICS) is a World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) standard for content labeling.
trans-unit.target: 平台的網際網路內容選取項目 (PICS) 是全球資訊網協會 (W3C) 標準，設定標記的內容。

trans-unit.source: PICS is essentially a language for creating a ratings system.
trans-unit.target: PICS 是基本上是一種語言建立分級系統。

trans-unit.source: Any value can be a PICS label; ASP.NET does not validate the label.
trans-unit.target: 任何值可以是 PICS 標籤。ASP.NET 不會驗證標籤。

trans-unit.source: The maximum length of the string is 255 characters.
trans-unit.target: 字串的最大長度為 255 個字元。

trans-unit.source: For more information about PICS standards and syntax, see the [World Wide Web Consortium](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37125) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需 PICS 標準和語法的詳細資訊，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37125)網站。

trans-unit.source: The following example is an ASP.NET page that displays an image.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示影像的 ASP.NET 網頁。

trans-unit.source: The page code calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Pics%2A> method to set the HTTP `PICS-Label` header for the response.
trans-unit.target: 頁面的程式碼呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Pics%2A>方法，以設定 HTTP`PICS-Label`回應標頭。

trans-unit.source: The string that is passed as the parameter to the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Pics%2A> method represents a rating label generated from the Internet Content Rating Association (ICRA) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 會當做參數傳遞的字串<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Pics%2A>方法代表從網際網路內容分級關聯 (ICRA) 網站上產生的評等標籤。

trans-unit.source: Promotes a promised object.
trans-unit.target: 提升承諾的物件。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the push request.
trans-unit.target: 推播要求的 URL。

trans-unit.source: It should be the virtual path of the relative resource that the server wants to push to the client.
trans-unit.target: 其應為伺服器想要推送到用戶端之相對資源的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: This API is to support applications sending push promises to HTTP 2.0 clients.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 可支援傳送推播確認給 HTTP 2.0 用戶端的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: You can find more details regarding to Http2 server push at [HTTP/2 Specification Section 8.2: Server Push](https://http2.github.io/http2-spec/#PushResources).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在下列網址上，找到更多有關 HTTP2 伺服器推播的詳細資料：[HTTP/2 Specification Section 8.2: Server Push](https://http2.github.io/http2-spec/#PushResources) (HTTP/2 規格 8.2 節：伺服器推播)。

trans-unit.source: PushPromise is non-deterministic and applications shouldn't have logic that depends on it.
trans-unit.target: PushPromise 不具決定性，而且應用程式不應該擁有邏輯取決於它。

trans-unit.source: Its only purpose is performance advantage in some cases.
trans-unit.target: 其唯一目的是在某些情況下的效能優勢。

trans-unit.source: There are many conditions (protocol and implementation) that may cause to ignore the push requests completely.
trans-unit.target: 有可能會導致完全忽略推播要求的許多情況 （通訊協定和實作）。

trans-unit.source: The expectation is based on fire-and-forget.
trans-unit.target: 預期為基礎和不理 」。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the push request.
trans-unit.target: 推播要求的 URL。

trans-unit.source: It should be the virtual path of the relative resource that the server wants to push to the client.
trans-unit.target: 其應為伺服器想要推送到用戶端之相對資源的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: Http request method that would be used by the push request.
trans-unit.target: 推播要求要使用的 HTTP 要求方法。

trans-unit.source: Http request header that would be used by the push request.
trans-unit.target: 推播要求要使用的 HTTP 要求標頭。

trans-unit.source: This API is to support applications sending push promises to HTTP 2.0 clients.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 可支援傳送推播確認給 HTTP 2.0 用戶端的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: You can find more details regarding to Http2 server push at [HTTP/2 Specification Section 8.2: Server Push](https://http2.github.io/http2-spec/#PushResources).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在下列網址上，找到更多有關 HTTP2 伺服器推播的詳細資料：[HTTP/2 Specification Section 8.2: Server Push](https://http2.github.io/http2-spec/#PushResources) (HTTP/2 規格 8.2 節：伺服器推播)。

trans-unit.source: PushPromise is non-deterministic and applications shouldn't have logic that depends on it.
trans-unit.target: PushPromise 不具決定性，而且應用程式不應該擁有邏輯取決於它。

trans-unit.source: Its only purpose is performance advantage in some cases.
trans-unit.target: 其唯一目的是在某些情況下的效能優勢。

trans-unit.source: There are many conditions (protocol and implementation) that may cause to ignore the push requests completely.
trans-unit.target: 有可能會導致完全忽略推播要求的許多情況 （通訊協定和實作）。

trans-unit.source: The expectation is based on fire-and-forget.
trans-unit.target: 預期為基礎和不理 」。

trans-unit.source: Redirects a client to a new URL.
trans-unit.target: 重新導向用戶端至新的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The target location.
trans-unit.target: 目標位置。

trans-unit.source: This may be an application-relative virtual path.
trans-unit.target: 這可能是應用程式相對虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: Redirects a request to a new URL and specifies the new URL.
trans-unit.target: 重新導向要求至新的 URL 並指定新的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A> is equivalent to calling <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A> with the second parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A>就相當於呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A>與第二個參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A> calls <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A> which throws a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException> exception upon completion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A> 呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A>哪些會擲回<xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>完成時的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This exception has a detrimental effect on Web application performance.
trans-unit.target: 這個例外狀況會有不利的影響，對 Web 應用程式效能。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, we recommend that instead of this overload you use the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> overload and pass `false` for the `endResponse` parameter, and then call the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 因此，我們建議您使用而不是這個多載<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>多載，並傳遞`false`如`endResponse`參數，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For mobile pages only, if your application relies on cookieless sessions, or might receive requests from mobile devices that require cookieless sessions, using a tilde (~) in a path can result in creating a new session and potentially losing session data.
trans-unit.target: 僅適用行動網頁，如果您的應用程式依賴無 cookie 工作階段，或可能會收到要求，從行動裝置需要無 cookie 工作階段之路徑中使用波狀符號 （~） 導致建立新的工作階段，可能遺失工作階段資料。

trans-unit.source: To set a property on a mobile control with a path such as "~/path", resolve the path using <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ResolveUrl%2A> "~/path" before assigning it to the property.
trans-unit.target: 行動控制項以路徑上設定屬性，例如"~ / 路徑 」，解析路徑使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ResolveUrl%2A>"~ / 路徑 」 之前將其指派給屬性。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET performs the redirection by returning a 302 HTTP status code.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會藉由傳回 302 的 HTTP 狀態碼來執行重新導向。

trans-unit.source: An alternative way to transfer control to another page is the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 將控制權轉移到另一個頁面的替代方式是<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method is typically more efficient because it does not cause a round trip to the client.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法是通常更有效率，因為它不會往返造成用戶端。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Redirect Users to Another Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/daef3f43-e018-43aa-b43c-46b27bac599e).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 將使用者重新導向至其他頁面](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/daef3f43-e018-43aa-b43c-46b27bac599e)。

trans-unit.source: The following example forces an unconditional redirection to another Web site.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會強制無條件的重新導向至另一個網站。

trans-unit.source: A redirection is attempted after the HTTP headers have been sent.
trans-unit.target: 在送出 HTTP 標頭之後嘗試重新導向。

trans-unit.source: The location of the target.
trans-unit.target: 目標的位置。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether execution of the current page should terminate.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否應該終止目前網頁的執行。

trans-unit.source: Redirects a client to a new URL.
trans-unit.target: 重新導向用戶端至新的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the new URL and whether execution of the current page should terminate.
trans-unit.target: 指定新 URL 和是否應該結束目前網頁的執行。

trans-unit.source: An absolute URL (for example, http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx) or a relative URL (for example, Default.aspx) can be specified for the target location but some browsers may reject a relative URL.
trans-unit.target: 絕對 URL (例如，http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx)或相對 URL (例如 Default.aspx) 可以指定的目標位置，但某些瀏覽器可能會拒絕相對 URL。

trans-unit.source: When you use this method in a page handler to terminate a request for one page and start a new request for another page, set `endResponse` to `false` and then call the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用這個方法中網頁處理常式終止要求一頁並啟動新要求的另一個頁面上，設定`endResponse`至`false`，然後呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.CompleteRequest%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you specify `true` for the `endResponse` parameter, this method calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A> method for the original request, which throws a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException> exception when it completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定`true`如`endResponse`參數，這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A>原始要求，會擲回方法<xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>完成時的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This exception has a detrimental effect on Web application performance, which is why passing `false` for the `endResponse` parameter is recommended.
trans-unit.target: 這個例外狀況，並在 Web 應用程式效能，這就是為什麼傳遞的不利影響`false`如`endResponse`建議參數。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For mobile pages, if your application relies on cookieless sessions, or might receive requests from mobile devices that require cookieless sessions, using a tilde (~) in a path can create a new session and potentially lose session data.
trans-unit.target: 行動頁面，如果您的應用程式依賴無 cookie 工作階段，或可能會收到要求，從行動裝置需要無 cookie 工作階段之路徑中使用波狀符號 （~） 可以建立新的工作階段及可能遺失工作階段的資料。

trans-unit.source: To set a property on a mobile control with a path such as "~/path", resolve the path using <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ResolveUrl%2A> "~/path" before assigning it to the property.
trans-unit.target: 行動控制項以路徑上設定屬性，例如"~ / 路徑 」，解析路徑使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ResolveUrl%2A>"~ / 路徑 」 之前將其指派給屬性。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET performs the redirection by returning a 302 HTTP status code.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會藉由傳回 302 的 HTTP 狀態碼來執行重新導向。

trans-unit.source: An alternative way to transfer control to another page is the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 將控制權轉移到另一個頁面的替代方式是<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method is typically more efficient because it does not cause a round trip to the client.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法是通常更有效率，因為它不會往返造成用戶端。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Redirect Users to Another Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/daef3f43-e018-43aa-b43c-46b27bac599e).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 將使用者重新導向至其他頁面](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/daef3f43-e018-43aa-b43c-46b27bac599e)。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.IsClientConnected%2A> property to check whether the client that is requesting the page remains connected to the server.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.IsClientConnected%2A>屬性來檢查是否要求網頁用戶端仍然連接到伺服器。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.IsClientConnected%2A> is true, the code calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A> method, and the client will view another page.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.IsClientConnected%2A>為 true，程式碼會呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A>方法和用戶端會檢視另一頁。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.IsClientConnected%2A> is false, then the code calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A> method and all page processing is terminated.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.IsClientConnected%2A>為 false，則程式碼會呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A>方法和所有的網頁處理已終止。

trans-unit.source: Performs a permanent redirection from the requested URL to the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 執行從要求之 URL 至指定之 URL 的永久重新導向。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.RedirectPermanent%28System.String%29> method overload provides a 301 HTTP status code in the response and includes the URL to redirect the request to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.RedirectPermanent%28System.String%29>方法多載 301 的 HTTP 狀態碼回應中提供，並包含重新導向的要求的 URL。

trans-unit.source: A 301 HTTP status code is a standard code in an HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: 301 的 HTTP 狀態碼是標準的程式碼，在 HTTP 回應中。

trans-unit.source: It indicates that a permanent redirection exists, and it provides the redirection location.
trans-unit.target: 代表永久重新導向存在，且它會提供重新導向位置。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.RedirectPermanent%28System.String%29> method overload terminates the response.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.RedirectPermanent%28System.String%29>方法多載會終止回應。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.RedirectPermanent%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method overload provides a 301 HTTP status code in the response and includes the URL to redirect the request to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.RedirectPermanent%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法多載 301 的 HTTP 狀態碼回應中提供，並包含重新導向的要求的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This method overload also provides the option to specify whether to terminate or to complete the response after the redirection has been performed.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Status%2A> 已被取代之喜好<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.StatusDescription%2A>並提供是為了與 ASP 的舊版本相容性。

trans-unit.target: 狀態被設定為無效狀態碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the HTTP status code of the output returned to the client.

trans-unit.source: An Integer representing the status of the HTTP output returned to the client.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 200 (OK)。

trans-unit.source: For a listing of valid status codes, see [Http Status Codes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=73157).
trans-unit.target: 如需有效狀態碼的清單，請參閱[Http 狀態碼](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=73157)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value qualifying the status code of the response.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that represents the [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] sub status code.
trans-unit.target: 整數值，代表 [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] 子狀態碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.SubStatusCode%2A> property is only supported with the integrated pipeline mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework version 3.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.SubStatusCode%2A>的整合式的管線模式中才支援屬性[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]且至少為.NET Framework 3.0 版。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.SubStatusCode%2A> property, the status is logged on [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] if failed-request tracing is configured.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.SubStatusCode%2A>屬性，狀態登入[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]如果失敗的要求追蹤的設定。

trans-unit.source: Independent of whether tracing is configured, the code is never sent as part of the final response to the request.
trans-unit.target: 無關的值是否設定追蹤，將程式碼永遠不會傳送要求的最後一個回應的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Troubleshooting Failed Requests Using Failed Request Tracing in IIS 7.0](http://www.iis.net/default.aspx?tabid=2&subtabid=25&i=969&p=1).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[疑難排解失敗的要求使用失敗要求的追蹤在 IIS 7.0 中](http://www.iis.net/default.aspx?tabid=2&subtabid=25&i=969&p=1)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to send HTTP content to the client.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否送出 HTTP 內容至用戶端。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to suppress output; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要隱藏輸出，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If it is, the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.SuppressContent%2A> property is set to true to stop the response from being sent.
